attributes.action: require brokers to get prior permission from share owners to make their shares available to short sellers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment brokers assume shares held by investors can be made available to short sellers and the brokers thereby earn on the short selling transaction. As a share holder I do not want my shares to be lent to short sellers as this tends to drive down the share price (through increased supply at stable demand), which is not in my best interests.
It should be assumed, in law, that share owners do not want to lend their shares to short sellers unless they have given prior approval.
